member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.GetApplication
member.summary: Gets an instance of the application.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.GetDispatcher
member.summary: Gets the core dispatcher used to access elements on the UI thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.GetHandleFromIInspectable
member.summary: Gets an InstanceHandle representation of an .
member.param: An instance of the object as an .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.GetIInspectableFromHandle
member.summary: Gets the from the XAML Diagnostics cache.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.GetInitializationData
member.summary: Gets the initialization data passed in to XAML Diagnostics.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.GetUiLayer
member.summary: Gets the visual diagnostics root that can be used to draw on for highlighting elements in the tree.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.HitTest
member.summary: Gets all elements in the visual tree that fall within the specified rectangle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IXamlDiagnostics.RegisterInstance
member.summary: Adds an to the XAML Diagnostics cache and returns the newly createdInstanceHandle for the object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
